type.description: Task type. code: write/modify source code (default). explore: investigate, test, or gather information using browser or CLI tools, then output findings. command: execute a specific command (deploy, migrate, etc).

description.description: Detailed description of what needs to be done

depends_on.description: IDs of tasks that must complete before this one

context_files.description: File paths relevant to this task (to read or modify)

acceptance_criteria.description: Conditions that must be true when the task is complete

estimated_complexity.description: trivial: 1 file, simple change. standard: 2-5 files. complex: 6+ files or architectural change.
